translation.pt_br: Permitir vendas de itens de inventário resultarem saldo negativo? PhreeBooks permite isto e o lançamento no diário que resultou em estoque negativo é reenviado quando o inventário é recebido para calcular os custos adequadamente.

translation.fr_fr: L'activation cette fonctionnalité fera arrondir par PhreeBooks™ les taxes calculées par autorité avant l'additon de toutes les autorités applicables. Pour les taux de taxe à une seule autorité
translation.ru_ru: Enabling this feature will cause PhreeBooks to round calculated taxes by authority prior to adding up all applicable authorities. For tax rates with a single authority
translation.bg_bg: Включването на тази опция ще накара PhreeBooks да закръгля изчислените данъци преди да ги добавя един към друг. За данъчни ставки само с един вид данък
translation.en_us: Enabling this feature will cause PhreeBooks to round calculated taxes by authority prior to adding up all applicable authorities. For tax rates with a single authority
translation.id_id: Enabling this feature will cause PhreeBooks to round calculated taxes by authority prior to adding up all applicable authorities. For tax rates with a single authority
translation.nl_nl: Inschakelen van deze functie heeft tot gevolg dat PhreeBooks naar berekende belastingen afrond voordat ze worden opgeteld . Voor de belastingtarieven met een enkele autoriteit
translation.pt_br: Habilitar esta função fará a Contabilidade arredondar taxas calculadas por autoridade antes de lançar em cada autoridade. Para taxas com somente uma autoridade

translation.es_cr:
Fija la fecha de comienzo para calcular la antigüedad de la cuenta. Las opciones son:
0 - Fecha de la factura ó 1 - Fecha de vencimiento
translation.fr_fr:
Définit la date de début utilisée pour le calcul du vieillissement de compte. Les choix sont:
0 - Date de la facture ou 1 - Date d'échéance
translation.ru_ru:
Sets the start time for account aging. Choices are:
0 - Invoice Date or 1 - Due Date
translation.bg_bg: Фиксира началната дата за стареене на сметки.
translation.id_id: Sets the start date for account aging.

translation.es_cr: Antigüedad de la Cuenta - Fecha de Comienzo de Cálculo
translation.fr_fr: Date de départ du vieillissement de compte

translation.es_cr: Determina el número de días para la primera advertencia de vencimiento de las facturas. El período comienza en la fecha del comienzo de la Antigüedad.
translation.fr_fr: Détermine le nombre de jours pour le premier avertissement de factures en souffrance. Le délai court à partir de la date de début de vieillissement de compte.
translation.ru_ru: Determines the number of days for the first warning of past due invoices. The period starts from the Account Aging Start Date Field.
translation.bg_bg: Определя броя на дните за първото предупреждение за просрочени фактури. Периода започва от полето за начална дата на стареене на сметките.
translation.en_us: Determines the number of days for the first warning of past due invoices. The period starts from the Account Aging Start Date Field.
translation.id_id: Determines the number of days for the first warning of past due invoices. The period starts from the Account Aging Start Date Field.
translation.nl_nl: Bepaalt het aantal dagen voor de eerste waarschuwing van achterstallige facturen. De periode start vanaf de Startdatum Factuur Leeftijd veld.
translation.pt_br: Determina o número de dias para o primeiro aviso da atraso de pagamento. O período inicia a partir da data inicial para atraso contas.

translation.es_cr: Determina el número de días para la segunda advertencia de vencimiento de las facturas. El período comienza en la fecha del comienzo de la Antigüedad.
translation.fr_fr: Détermine le nombre de jours pour le premier avertissement de factures en souffrance. Le délai court à partir de la date de début de vieillissement de compte.
translation.ru_ru: Determines the number of days for the first warning of past due invoices. The period starts from the Account Aging Start Date Field.
translation.bg_bg: Определя броя на дните за второто предупреждение за просрочени фактури. Периода започва от полето за начална дата на стареене на сметките.
translation.en_us: Determines the number of days for the second warning of past due invoices. The period starts from the Account Aging Start Date Field.
translation.id_id: Determines the number of days for the second warning of past due invoices. The period starts from the Account Aging Start Date Field.
translation.nl_nl: Bepaalt het aantal dagen voor de tweede waarschuwing van achterstallige facturen. De periode start vanaf de Startdatum Factuur Leeftijd veld.
translation.pt_br: Determina o número de dias para o segundo aviso da atraso de pagamento. O período inicia a partir da data inicial para atraso contas.

translation.es_cr: Determina el número de días para la tercera advertencia de vencimiento de las facturas. El período comienza en la fecha del comienzo de la Antigüedad.
translation.fr_fr: Détermine le nombre de jours pour le premier avertissement de factures en souffrance. Le délai court à partir de la date de début de vieillissement de compte.
translation.ru_ru: Determines the number of days for the first warning of past due invoices. The period starts from the Account Aging Start Date Field.
translation.bg_bg: Определя броя на дните за третото предупреждение за просрочени фактури. Периода започва от полето за начална дата на стареене на сметките.
translation.en_us: Determines the number of days for the third warning of past due invoices. The period starts from the Account Aging Start Date Field.
translation.id_id: Determines the number of days for the third warning of past due invoices. The period starts from the Account Aging Start Date Field.
translation.nl_nl: Bepaalt het aantal dagen voor de derde waarschuwing van achterstallige facturen. De periode start vanaf de Startdatum Factuur Leeftijd veld.
translation.pt_br: Determina o número de dias para o terceiro aviso da atraso de pagamento. O período inicia a partir da data inicial para atraso contas.

translation.es_cr: Cuenta predeterminada para todos los códigos a no ser que se especifique otra cuenta en la pantalla del código.

translation.ru_ru: The default account for all items unless specified in the individual item record.

translation.es_cr:
Tasa de impuesto de ventas predeterminado a usar en la creación de códigos de inventario.

NOTA: Este valor se aplica en la creación automática de códigos y puede ser cambiada en Inventario => Lista de códigos. La tasa de impuestos se selecciona de una tabla de la base de datos y se debe fijar durante la instalación o cambiarlo en Configuración => Tasa Impuesto de Ventas.
translation.fr_fr:
Détermine le taux de taxe par défaut des ventes à utiliser lors de l'ajout de nouveaux articles en stock.

NOTE: Cette valeur est appliquée à stocks Auto-Add mais peut être modifiée dans Inventaire => Écran maintenance. Les taux de taxe sont choisis dans la table tax_rates et doivent être configurés à travers Paramètrage => Taux de taxe des ventes.
translation.ru_ru:
Determines the default sales tax rate to use when adding inventory items.

NOTE: This value is applied to inventory Auto-Add but can be changed in the Inventory => Maintain screen. The tax rates are selected from the table tax_rates and must be setup through Setup => Sales tax Rates.
translation.en_us: Determines the default sales tax rate to use when adding inventory items. NOTE: This value is applied to inventory Auto-Add but can be changed in the Inventory => Maintain screen. The tax rates are selected from the table tax_rates and must be setup through Setup => Sales tax Rates.
translation.id_id: Determines the default sales tax rate to use when adding inventory items. NOTE: This value is applied to inventory Auto-Add but can be changed in the Inventory => Maintain screen. The tax rates are selected from the table tax_rates and must be setup through Setup => Sales tax Rates.
translation.nl_nl:
Bepaalt het standaard belasting tarief wanneer nieuwe voorraad wordt toegevoegd.

OPMERKING: Deze waarde wordt toegepast op de Auto-voorraad toevoegen maar kan gewijzigd worden in de Voorraad => Onderhoud scherm. De belastingtarieven zijn geselecteerd uit de tabel tax_rates en moet instellen via Setup => Verkoop belastingtarieven.
translation.pt_br: Determina a taxa padrão de vendas para utilizar quando inserir itens de inventário. ATENÇÃO: Este valor é aplicado ao inventário Auto-Add mas pode ser modificado na tela Inventário => Manutenção. Os valores de taxas são selecionados da tabela taxas_valores e devem ser especificadas na tela Setup => Taxas de Vendas.

translation.es_cr: Tasa de Impuesto de Ventas Predeterminado para Nuevos Códigos de Inventario
translation.fr_fr: Taux de taxe par défaut des ventes pour les nouveaux articles en stock
translation.ru_ru: Default Sales Tax Rate For New Inventory Items

translation.es_cr:
Tasa de impuesto de compras predeterminada a usar en la creación de códigos de inventario.

NOTA: Este valor se aplica en la creación automática de códigos y puede ser cambiada en Inventario => Lista de códigos. La tasa de impuestos se selecciona de una tabla de la base de datos y se debe fijar durante la instalación o cambiarlo en Configuración => Tasa Impuesto Compras.
translation.fr_fr:
Détermine le taux de taxe par défaut des achats à utiliser lors de l'ajout de nouveaux articles en stock.

NOTE: Cette valeur est appliquée à stocks Auto-Add mais peut être modifiée dans Inventaire => Écran maintenance. Les taux de taxe sont choisis dans la table tax_rates et doivent être configurés à travers Paramètrage => Taux de taxe des achats.
translation.ru_ru:
Determines the default purchase tax rate to use when adding inventory items.

NOTE: This value is applied to inventory Auto-Add but can be changed in the Inventory => Maintain screen. The tax rates are selected from the table tax_rates and must be setup through Setup => Purchase tax Rates.
translation.en_us: Determines the default purchase tax rate to use when adding inventory items. NOTE: This value is applied to inventory Auto-Add but can be changed in the Inventory => Maintain screen. The tax rates are selected from the table tax_rates and must be setup through Setup => Purchase tax Rates.
translation.id_id: Determines the default purchase tax rate to use when adding inventory items. NOTE: This value is applied to inventory Auto-Add but can be changed in the Inventory => Maintain screen. The tax rates are selected from the table tax_rates and must be setup through Setup => Purchase tax Rates.
translation.nl_nl:
Bepaalt het standaard belasting tarief wanneer nieuwe voorraad wordt toegevoegd.

OPMERKING: Deze waarde wordt toegepast op de Auto-voorraad toevoegen maar kan gewijzigd worden in de Voorraad => Onderhoud scherm. De belastingtarieven zijn geselecteerd uit de tabel tax_rates en moet instellen via Setup => Inkoop belastingtarieven.
translation.pt_br: Determina a taxa padrão de compras para utilizar quando inserir itens de inventário. ATENÇÃO: Este valor é aplicado ao inventário Auto-Add mas pode ser modificado na tela Inventário => Manutenção. Os valores de taxas são selecionados da tabela taxas_valores e devem ser especificadas na tela Setup => Taxas de Compras.

translation.es_cr: Tasa de Impuesto de Compras para Nuevos Códigos de Inventario
translation.fr_fr: Taux de taxe par défaut des achats pour les nouveaux articles en stock
translation.ru_ru: Default Purchase Tax Rate For New Inventory Items

translation.es_cr:
Permite la creación automática de códigos de inventario en las pantallas de órdenes.

En Phreebooks
translation.fr_fr:
Permet la création automatique des articles en stock dans les écrans de commande.

UGS sont pas requises dans PhreeBooks™ pour les stocks de type non-traçable. Cette fonction permet la création automatique des numéros de référence dans la table inventaire de la base de données. Le type de stockage utilisé sera des articles en stock. Les comptes GL utilisés seront les comptes par défaut et la méthode de coût pour des articles en stock.
translation.ru_ru:
Allows the automatic creation of inventory items in the order screens.

SKUs are not required in PhreeBooks for non-trackable inventory types. This feature allows for the automatic creation of SKUs in the inventory database table. The inventory type used will be stock items. The GL accounts used will be the default accounts and costing method for stock items.
translation.bg_bg: Разрешава автоматичното създаване на артикули в инвентара на екраните за поръчки. SKUs не се изискват във PhreeBooks за непроследяем тип инвентар. Това позволява автоматично създаване на SKUs в таблицата за инвентар в БД. Използваният тип инвентар ще бъде стока. ГСК сметките ще бъдат сметките по подразбиране и ценообразуващия метод за стоки.
translation.en_us: Allows the automatic creation of inventory items in the order screens. SKUs are not required in PhreeBooks for non-trackable inventory types. This feature allows for the automatic creation of SKUs in the inventory database table. The inventory type used will be stock items. The GL accounts used will be the default accounts and costing method for stock items.
translation.id_id: Allows the automatic creation of inventory items in the order screens. SKUs are not required in PhreeBooks for non-trackable inventory types. This feature allows for the automatic creation of SKUs in the inventory database table. The inventory type used will be stock items. The GL accounts used will be the default accounts and costing method for stock items.
translation.nl_nl:
Hiermee kan automatisch Voorraad gemaakt worden in de order schermen.

Artikelnummers zijn niet vereist voor niet-traceerbare voorraad typen. Deze functie zorgt voor de automatisch maken van artikelen in de Voorraad database tabel. Het voorraad type gebruikt wordt is: voorraad-item. De grootboekrekeningen gebruikt zullen worden zijn de standaard rekeningen zo ook met de kostprijsberekening Methode.
translation.pt_br: Permite a criação automática de itens de inventário nas telas de ordem de compra. SKUs não são necessários no PhreeBooks para tipos de inventário não rastreáveis. Esta função permite a criação automática de SKUs na tabela de inventário. O tipo de inventário utilizado será item estoque. As contas utilizadas serão as padrões e métodos de custo para item estoque.

translation.es_cr: Habilite la Creación Automática de Códigos de Inventario
translation.fr_fr: Activer la création automatique des articles en stock
translation.ru_ru: Enable Automatic Creation of Inventory Items

translation.es_cr: Llena la lista con las opciones en el momento en que se está digitando el campo del código. Esta función es útil cuando se conoce el código ya que acelera el llenado del formulario de órdenes. Sin embargo
translation.fr_fr: Permet à un appel AJAX de remplir les choix possibles lorsque les données sont saisies dans le champ SKU. Cette fonction est utile lorsque les SKU sont connus et accélère le remplissage des formulaires de commande. Peut ralentir les saisies SKU lorsque des scanners à codes barres sont utilisés.
translation.ru_ru: Allows an ajax call to fill in possible choices as data is entered into the SKU field. his feature is helpful when the SKUs are known and expedites filling in order forms. May slow down SKU entries when bar code scanners are used.
translation.bg_bg: Разрешава ajax извикване за попълване на възможния избор при въвеждане на данни в полето SKU. Това е полезно
translation.en_us: Allows an ajax call to fill in possible choices as data is entered into the SKU field. This feature is helpful when the SKUs are known and expedites filling in order forms. May slow down SKU entries when bar code scanners are used.
translation.id_id: Allows an ajax call to fill in possible choices as data is entered into the SKU field. This feature is helpful when the SKUs are known and expedites filling in order forms. May slow down SKU entries when bar code scanners are used.
translation.nl_nl: Hiermee kan een ajax call de mogelijke keuzen in vullen
translation.pt_br: Permite uma chamada ajax preencher possíveis opções a medida que dados são digitados no campo SKU. Esta função é importante quando os SKUs são conhecidos e agiliza o preenchimento de ordens de compras. Pode tornar lentas entradas de SKU quando leitores de código de barra são utilizados.

translation.es_cr: Llene Automáticamente Lista Plegable de Inventario Cuando Digita Códigos en Órdenes
translation.fr_fr: Remplissage automatique du menu déroulant de stock lors de la saisie des SKU sur les écrans de commande
translation.ru_ru: AutoFill Inventory Pull Down When Entering SKUs on Order Screens

translation.es_cr: Habilite búsqueda automática de códigos existentes en el formulario de órdenes
translation.fr_fr: Activer la recherche automatique des SKU correspondants sur l'écran de commande
translation.ru_ru: Enable auto search of SKU matches on order screen

translation.es_cr: Fija el número de caracteres esperado cuando se está leyendo códigos de barras. PhreeBooks empieza la búsqueda solo después de que se alcanza el número de caracteres. Valores típicos son de 12 ó 13 caracteres.
translation.fr_fr: Définit le nombre de caractères attendus lors de la lecture de valeurs de codes barres du stock. PhreeBooks effectue une recherche uniquement lorsque le nombre de caractères a été atteint. Des valeurs typiques sont 12 et 13 caractères.
translation.ru_ru: Sets the number of characters to expect when reading inventory bar code values. PhreeBooks only searches when the number of characters has been reached. Typical values are 12 and 13 characters.
translation.en_us: Sets the number of characters to expect when reading inventory bar code values. PhreeBooks only searches when the number of characters has been reached. Typical values are 12 and 13 characters.
translation.id_id: Sets the number of characters to expect when reading inventory bar code values. PhreeBooks only searches when the number of characters has been reached. Typical values are 12 and 13 characters.
translation.nl_nl: Stelt het aantal tekens te verwachten bij het lezen van voorraad streepjescode. PhreeBooks zoekt alleen wanneer het aantal tekens is bereikt. Typische waarden zijn 12 en 13 tekens.
translation.pt_br: Estabelece o número de caracteres esperados quando leitores de código de barra são utilizados. PhreeBooks só realiza a busca quando o número de caracteres foi atingido. Valores típicos são 12 ou 13 caracteres.

translation.es_cr: Longitud del código para lectores de barras en el formulario de órdenes
translation.fr_fr: Longueur du SKU pour les lecteurs de codes barres dans les écrans de commande
translation.ru_ru: Length of SKU for Bar code readers in order screens

translation.es_cr: Habilite la actualización automática del costo del código para compras con Órden de Compra
translation.fr_fr: Activer la mise à jour automatique du coût des articles en stock pour les commandes fournisseurs / Achats
translation.ru_ru: Enable automatic update of item cost in inventory for PO/ Purchases

translation.fr_fr: Longueur minimale du mot de passe

translation.es_cr: Número máximo de resultados devueltos por la búsqueda por página
translation.fr_fr: Nombre maximum de résultats de recherche renvoyés par page
translation.ru_ru: Maximum number of search results returned per page
translation.bg_bg: Максимален брой на резултати от търсене
translation.id_id: Maximum number of search results returned per page

translation.es_cr: Número Máximo de Resultados de la Búsqueda por Página
translation.fr_fr: Nombre maximum de résultats de recherche par page

translation.es_cr: Automáticamene revisa a ver si hay actualizaciones del programa cuando hace el login a PhreeBooks.
translation.fr_fr: Vérifier automatiquement les mises à jour du logiciel lors de la connexion à PhreeBooks™.
translation.ru_ru: Automatically check for program updates at login to PhreeBooks.
translation.bg_bg: Автоматична проверка за ъпдейти на програмата при логване във PhreeBooks.
translation.en_us: Automatically check for program updates at login to PhreeBooks.
translation.id_id: Automatically check for program updates at login to PhreeBooks.
translation.nl_nl: Automatisch controleren op programma updates bij het login.
translation.pt_br: Verificar automaticamente novas versões do PhreeBooks.

translation.es_cr: Revise Automáticamene Si Hay Actualizaciones del Programa
translation.fr_fr: Vérifier automatiquement les mises à jour du logiciel

translation.es_cr:
Esconda mensajes de notificación de operaciones realizadas exitósamente.
Solo muestre mensajes de precaución y error.
translation.fr_fr:
Cacher les messages sur les opérations réussies.
Seuls les messages d'attention et d'erreur seront affichés.
translation.ru_ru:
Hides messages on successful operations.
Only caution and error messages will be displayed.
translation.bg_bg: Скрива съобщенията за успешните операции. Само предупрежденията и съобщенията за грешка ще бъдат показвани.
translation.en_us: Hides messages on successful operations. Only caution and error messages will be displayed.
translation.id_id: Hides messages on successful operations. Only caution and error messages will be displayed.
translation.nl_nl:
Verbergt succes berichten.
Alleen voorzichtig en foutmeldingen worden weergegeven.
translation.pt_br: Não apresenta mensagens em operações bem sucedidas. Somente mensagens de ATENÇÃO e ERRO serão mostradas.

translation.es_cr:
Actualiza automáticamente el tipo de cambio de todas las monedas definidas con cada login.
Si se desabilita
translation.fr_fr:
Mise à jour du taux de change des devises chargées à chaque connexion.
Si désactivé
translation.ru_ru:
Updates the exchange rate for loaded currencies at every login.
If disabled
translation.bg_bg:
Обновява обменния курс за заредените валути на всеки логин.
Ако е изключено
translation.en_us:
Updates the exchange rate for loaded currencies at every login.
If disabled
translation.id_id:
Updates the exchange rate for loaded currencies at every login.
If disabled
translation.nl_nl:
Update de wisselkoers van valuta bij elke login.
Indien uitgeschakeld kunnen valuta handmatig worden aangepast in het menu Setup => Valuta.
translation.pt_br:
Atualiza as taxas de conversão das moedas carregadas em todo login.
Se desabilitado

translation.fr_fr: Mise à jour automatique des devises

translation.es_cr: Limita la cantidad de Ventas/Compras históricas que se muestran para cuentas de clientes/proveedores.
translation.fr_fr: Limite la longueur des valeurs de l'historique montrées dans les comptes client/fournisseur pour les ventes/achats.

translation.en_us: Limits the length of history values shown in customer/vendor accounts for sales/purchases.

translation.nl_nl: Beperkt de geschiedenis in de klant / leverancier accounts van verkopen en inkopen.
translation.pt_br: Limita o tamanho dos valores históricos mostrados nas contas de cliente/fornecedor para vendas/compras.

translation.es_cr: Límite de Resultados para Historia de Cliente/Proveedor
translation.fr_fr: Limiter les résultats de l'historique Client/Fournisseur

translation.es_cr: Fija la aplicación a usar para generar los reportes y formularios en formato PDF. FPDF es mas estable y produce resultados mas confiables pero no maneja codificación en fuentes UTF-8 o código de barras. TCPDF es mas robusto pero aún está en desarrollo y puede que requiera actualizaciones adicionales para tener la versión mas reciente.
translation.fr_fr: Définit l'application tierce par défaut à utiliser pour générer les rapports et formulaires. FPDF est plus stable et produit des résultats plus fiables
translation.ru_ru: Sets the default third party application to use for generating reoports and forms. FPDF is more stable and produces more reliable results but cannot handle UTF-8 fonts or barcodes. TCPDF is more robust but is still undergoing development pains and may require additional updates to stay with the current version.

translation.es_cr: Aplicación Predeterminada a Usar para Generar Reportes y Formularios PDF
translation.fr_fr: Programme par défaut pour générer les rapports et formulaires PDF
translation.ru_ru: Default Application to Generate PDF Reports and Forms

translation.es_cr: Especifica las preferencias de exportación cuando se exportan reportes y formularios. La opción local salvará el archivo del reporte en el directorio /my_files/reports del servidor para poder ser usado por todas las compañías. Descargar bajará el archivo a su navegador de donde podrá salvar/imprimir el reporte desde su computador.
translation.fr_fr: Spécifie la préférence d'exportation lors de l'exportation des rapports et des formulaires. 'Local' va les sauvegarder dans le répertoire /my_files/reports du serveur web pour être utilisés avec toutes les sociétés. 'Download' va télécharger le fichier par votre navigateur pour le sauvegarder/l'imprimer sur votre machine locale.
translation.ru_ru: Specifies the export preference when exporting reports and forms. Local will save them in the /my_files/reports directory of the webserver for use with all companies. Download will download the file to your browser to save/print on your local machine.
translation.en_us: Specifies the export preference when exporting reports and forms. Local will save them in the /my_files/reports directory of the webserver for use with all companies. Download will download the file to your browser to save/print on your local machine.
translation.id_id: Specifies the export preference when exporting reports and forms. Local will save them in the /my_files/reports directory of the webserver for use with all companies. Download will download the file to your browser to save/print on your local machine.
translation.nl_nl: Bepaalt de standaard export voorkeur van rapporten en formulieren. Lokaal zal ze opslaan in de /my_files/reports directory van de webserver
translation.pt_br: Especifica a preferência de exportação quando exportando relatórios e formulários. Local vai salvá-los no diretório /my_files/reports do sevidor web para uso de todas as empresas. Download vai baixar o arquivo no seu browser para salvar/imprimir na máquina local.

translation.es_cr: ¿Quiere mostrar errores si falla el envío del correo? Fijar esto a No causará que PHP muestre los errores y posiblemente falle el procedimiento. Solo defina cono No para resolver problemas y Si para producción.

translation.es_cr:
¿Su servidor de correo requiere que todo correo saliente tenga una dirección "De" que concuerde con un dominio conocido y que exista en su servidor de páginas?

Esto generalmente se exije para prevenir falsificaciones y transmisiones masivas de spam. Si se fija en SI
translation.fr_fr:
Est-ce que votre serveur de messagerie exige que tous les courriels sortants aient leur adresse "FROM" qui corresponde à un domaine connu existant sur votre serveur web ?

Cela est souvent établi afin d'éviter le trucage et le spam. Si la valeur est OUI
translation.ru_ru:
Does your mailserver require that all outgoing emails have their "from" address match a known domain that exists on your webserver?

This is often set in order to prevent spoofing and spam broadcasts. If set to Yes

translation.es_cr:
Digite el nombre de la cuenta de correo (yo@midominio.com) que le dió su administrador del servidor. Este es el nombre de la cuenta que su servidor requiere para autentificación SMTP.
Solo se necesita si el servidor está usando autentificación SMTP.
translation.fr_fr:
Entrez le nom du compte de boîte aux lettres (me@mydomain.com) fourni par votre hébergeur. C'est le nom du compte dont votre hôte a besoin pour l'authentification SMTP.
Uniquement nécessaire si vous utilisez l'authentification SMTP pour le courrier électronique.
translation.ru_ru:
Enter the mailbox account name (me@mydomain.com) supplied by your host. This is the account name that your host requires for SMTP authentication.
Only required if using SMTP Authentication for email.
translation.en_us: Enter the mailbox account name (me@mydomain.com) supplied by your host. This is the account name that your host requires for SMTP authentication. (Only required if using SMTP Authentication for email)
translation.id_id: Enter the mailbox account name (me@mydomain.com) supplied by your host. This is the account name that your host requires for SMTP authentication. (Only required if using SMTP Authentication for email)
translation.nl_nl:
Voer de mail account naam in (me@mydomain.com) Geleverd door uw host. Dit is de account naam die uw host voor SMTP-verificatie vereist.
Alleen verplicht als u SMTP-verificatie(SMTPAUTH) gebruikt voor e-mail.
translation.pt_br: Entre a conta de email me@meudominio.com). Esta á a conta de email que requer autenticação SMTP. (Só é necessária se estiver utilizando Autenticação SMTP para email)

translation.fr_fr: Compte de boîte aux lettres pour le courrier par SMTP

translation.es_cr:
Digite la Contraseña SMTP de su correo.
Solo se necesita si el servidor está usando autentificación SMTP.

Entrez le mot de passe pour votre boîte aux lettres SMTP.
Uniquement nécessaire si vous utilisez l'authentification SMTP pour le courrier électronique.
translation.ru_ru:
Enter the password for your SMTP mailbox.
Only required if using SMTP Authentication for email.

ie: correo.midominio.com
ó 55.66.77.88

ou 55.66.77.88

ie: mail.mydomain.com

Descripción - Solo la descripción de cuenta.
Ambos - Muestre ambos
translation.fr_fr:
Détermine la manière d'afficher les comptes du Grand Livre dans les menus déroulants.
Nombre - Numéro de compte GL seulement.
Description - Description de compte GL uniquement.
Les 2 - Le numéro et le nom de compte GL seront affichés.
translation.ru_ru:
Determines how to display the general ledger accounts in pull-down menus.
Number - GL Account Number Only.
Description - GL Account Description Only.
Both - Both gl number and name will be displayed.
translation.bg_bg:
Определя как да покаже сметките от ГСК в менюто
Номер - Само номер на сметка от ГСК.
Описание - Само описание на ГСК сметка.
И двете - Ще бъдат показани и номера на сметката и името.
translation.en_us:
Determines how to display the general ledger accounts in pull-down menus.
Number - GL Account Number Only.
Description - GL Account Description Only.
Both - Both gl number and name will be displayed.

Bepaalt hoe het grootboek rekeningen in pull-down menu\'s weer te geven.
Nummer - Alleen het grootboek rekeningnummer.
Omschrijving - Alleen de grootboek omschrijving.
Beide - Zowel het grootboek nummer als de omschrijving zullen worden getoont.
translation.pt_br:
Determina como mostrar as contas em menus pull-down .
Número - somente número da conta.
Descrição - somente descrição conta.
Ambos - número e descrição serão mostrados.

translation.es_cr:
Digite el tiempo predeterminado en segundos
Ejemplo: 3600= 1 hora

Nota: Muy poco tiempo puede resultar en que le dé problemas de desconección cuando agrega o edita códigos de inventario.
translation.fr_fr:
Entrez le temps en secondes. Par défaut=3600
Exemple: 3600= 1 heure

Note: trop peu de secondes peut entraîner des problèmes de session expirée lors de l'ajout/modification de produits.
translation.ru_ru:
Enter the time in seconds. Default=3600
Example: 3600= 1 hour

Note: Too few seconds can result in timeout issues when adding/editing products.
translation.bg_bg:
Таймаут на сесията - Въведете време в секунди (3600 по подразбиране). Пример: 3600= 1 час
Забележка: Твърде малко секунди могат да доведат до таймаут проблеми при добавяне/редактиране на продукти.
translation.en_us:
Session Timeout - Enter the time in seconds (default = 3600). Example: 3600= 1 hour
Note: Too few seconds can result in timeout issues when adding/editing products
translation.id_id:
Session Timeout - Enter the time in seconds (default = 3600). Example: 3600= 1 hour
Note: Too few seconds can result in timeout issues when adding/editing products.
translation.nl_nl:
Voer de tijd seconden in. (Standaard = 3600). Voorbeeld: 3600 = 1 uur
LET OP: Te weinig seconden kan resulteren in een time-out problemen bij het toevoegen / bewerken van producten.
translation.pt_br:
Limite Tempo Sessão - Entre o tempo em segundos (padrão = 3600). Exemplo: 3600 = 1 hora
Atenção: Poucos segundos podem resultar em problemas ao inserir/editar produtos.

translation.es_cr: Duración de la Sesión en Segundos

translation.nl_nl: Wanneer deze optie is ingeschakeld zal ajax gebruikt worden om de sessie-timer om de 5 minuten te vernieuwen om afmelden van de gebruiker te voorkomen. Deze functie helpt te voorkomen dat het opslaan mislukt. (wanneer het opslaan resulteert in een login scherm).

translation.hu_hu: Mi a cég adatait tároló adatbázis neve? Például lehet rövidített cégnév
translation.ru_ru: What is the name of the database used to hold the data? An example database name would be an abbreviated company name such as \'mycompany\'. Spaces or special characters are NOT allowed. <!-- If the database is not found the database will be created.-->

translation.es_cr: Contraseña para la Base de Datos
translation.fr_fr: Mot de passe de la base de données

translation.es_cr: ¿Cuál es la contraseña usada para conectarse a la Base de Datos? La contraseña usada en combinación con el nombre del usuario forman la cuenta de usuario de la base de datos.
translation.fr_fr: Avec quel mot de passe se connecte t'on à votre base de données ? Le mot de passe va de pair avec le nom d'utilisateur pour former un compte utilisateur de votre base de données.
translation.hu_hu: Mi az adatbázis kapcsolódáshoz használt jelszó? A jelszó a felhasználónévvel együtt használatos
translation.ru_ru: What is the password used to connect to the database? The password is used together with the username

translation.es_cr: Prefijo para las Tablas de la Base de Datos
¿Qué prefijo le gustaría usar para las tablas de la base de datos? Por ejemplo: pb_. Deje en blanco si no necesita usar un prefijo.
translation.fr_fr:
Quel préfixe voulez-vous utiliser pour les tables à créer dans votre base de données ? Exemple: 'pb_'. Laissez vide si vous n'avez pas besoin de préfixe.
Vous pouvez utiliser les préfixes pour avoir plusieurs sociétés dans une même base de données.
translation.hu_hu: Milyen előtagot szeretnél használni az adatbázis táblákhoz? Például: pb_ Hagyd üresen
translation.ru_ru: What is the prefix you would like used for database tables? Example: pb_ Leave empty if no prefix is needed.

translation.es_cr: Sesiones de la Base de Datos
¿Quiere almacenar las sesiones en la base de datos? Seleccione \'SÍ\' si no está seguro.
translation.fr_fr: Voulez-vous stocker vos sessions dans votre base de données ? Cliquez sur 'oui' si vous n'êtes pas ssûr(e).
translation.hu_hu: A sessionöket az adatbázisban szeretnéd tárolni? Válaszolj \'igennel\' ha bizonytalan vagy.
translation.ru_ru: Do you want store your sessions in your database? Click \'yes\' if you are unsure.

translation.es_cr: Haga respaldo y limpie el registro de auditoría
translation.fr_fr: Sauvegarder et nettoyer les journaux d'audit

translation.es_cr:
Esta operación crea y baja un respaldo del archivo de registro de auditoría. Esto sirve para controlar el tamaño del archivo de la base de datos de la compañía y reducir el tamaño del archivo de respaldo. Se recomienda hacer el respaldo del registro de auditoría antes de limpiarlo para preservar la historia de transacciones.
NOTA: La limpieza del registro de auditoría deja la información del período actual y elimina todos los registros anteriores.
translation.fr_fr:
Cette opération crée une sauvegarde downloadée de votre fichier journal d'audit de BDD. Ceci aidera à minimiser la taille de la base de données et à réduire la taille des fichiers de sauvegarde de la société. La sauvegarde de ce journal est recommandée avant de le nettoyer de manière à préserver l'historique des transactions de PhreeBooks.
INFORMATION: Nettoyer le journal d'audit laissera les données de l'exercice en cours dans la table de la base de données et supprimera tous les autres enregistrements.
translation.ru_ru:
This operation creates a downloaded backup of your audit log database file. This will help keep the database size down and reduce company backup file sizes. Backing up this log is recommended before cleaning out to preserve PhreeBooks transaction history.
INFORMATION: Cleaning out the audit log will leave the current periods data in the database table and remove all other records.
translation.bg_bg: Тази операция създава свален архив на вашия одит лог файл от базата данни. Това ще помогне размерът на базата данни да се запази малък
translation.en_us:
This operation creates a downloaded backup of your audit log database file. This will help keep the database size down and reduce company backup file sizes. Backing up this log is recommended before cleaning out to preserve PhreeBooks transaction history.
INFORMATION: Cleaning out the audit log will leave the current periods data in the database table and remove all other records.
translation.id_id:
This operation creates a downloaded backup of your audit log database file. This will help keep the database size down and reduce company backup file sizes. Backing up this log is recommended before cleaning out to preserve PhreeBooks transaction history.
INFORMATION: Cleaning out the audit log will leave the current periods data in the database table and remove all other records.
translation.nl_nl:
Hiermee maakt u een backup van je gedownload audit log database-bestand. Dit zal helpen de grootte van de database en back-upbestand te beperken. Een back-up van deze log is aanbevolen voor het schoonmaken van de transactie te bewaren PhreeBooks geschiedenis.
INFORMATIE: Het reinigen van de audit log laat de huidige perioden gegevens in de database tabel en verwijdert alle andere records.
translation.pt_br: Esta operação cria uma cópia de segurança do seus arquivos de Logs de Auditoria. Isto vai ajudar a manter o tamanho da base de dados menor e reduzirá a necessidade de espaço de backup para a empresa. Fazer cópia de segurança deste log é recomendado antes de limpá-lo

translation.en_us: Your inventory_cogs_owed table currently has %s entries in it. This tool will attempt to re-post all entries in the inventory_cogs_owed table. The inventory_cogs_owed table should not have any entries in it unless the stock levels are negative. If the table has items listed and the stock levels are zero or greater
translation.nl_nl:
Uw inventory_cogs_owed tabel heeft op dit moment %s regels.
Deze tool zal alle regels controleren en opnieuw op slaan.
De inventory_cogs_owed tabel zou geen regels moeten bevatten tenzij de voorraad niveau\'s negatief zijn.
Als de tabel items bevat en de voorraad niveaus zijn nul of groter dan zal deze tool proberen om de tabel te repareren door het her-opslaan van de journaal posten.
Er waren problemen met release R3.6 en ouder. U kunt in een rapport be kijken welke items in uw cogs_owed tabel staan.

translation.es_cr:
Los cambios a los números de secuencia se pueden hacer aquí.
Nota 1: PhreeBooks no permite números de secuencia duplicados. Asegúrese que el número nuevo para empezar la secuencia no esté en confilco con ninguna transacción existente.
Nota 2: El número next_deposit_num (próximo número de depósito) es generado por el sistema y utiliza la fecha actual.
Nota 3: El número next_check_num (próximo número de cheque) puede ser fijado en la pantalla de pagos antes de salvar el pago y continuará a partir de ese número en transacciones sucesivas.
translation.fr_fr:
Les modifications des numéros de séquence peuvent être faites ici.
NOTE 1: PhreeBooks n'autorise pas des numéros de séquence en double

translation.es_cr: ¡Advertencia! Esta operación borrará y luego creará de nuevo la base de datos. ¿Está seguro que quiere continuar?
translation.fr_fr: ATTENTION ! Cette opération va supprimer et ré-écrire la base de données. Êtes-vous sûr(e) de vouloir continuer ?
translation.ru_ru: Warning! This operation will delete and re-write the database. Are you sure you want to continue?
translation.bg_bg: Предупреждение! Тази операция ще изтрие и презапише базата данни. Сигурни ли сте
translation.en_us: Warning! This operation will delete and re-write the database. Are you sure you want to continue?
translation.id_id: Perhatian! Operasi ini akan menghapus dan menulis ulang ke basis data. Anda yakin ingin melanjutkannya?
translation.nl_nl: Waarschuwing! Deze handeling zal de hele database verwijderen en opnieuw schrijven. Weet u zeker dat u door wil gaan?
translation.pt_br: Atenção! Esta operação vai remover e reescrever a base de dados. Tem certeza de que quer fazer isto?

translation.en_us:
Select the. csv file to import and click Import
If there is no bank account column in your .csv then select a bank account from the drop down box.
translation.es_cr:
Seleccione el archivo .csv para importar y presione Importe
Si no hay columna de cuenta de banco en el archivo .csv entonces seleccione la cuenta de la lista plegable.
translation.nl_nl:
Selecteer het .csv bestand dat u wilt importeren en klik op importeer.
Als er geen bank rekening kolom in het .csv bestand staat selecteer er dan een uit het keuze veld.
translation.pt_br:
Seleciona o arquivo .csv para importar e tecle Importar
Se não existe a coluna conta bancária no seu .csv selecione uma conta bancária na caixa de seleção.

translation.es_cr:
Esta herramienta establece presupuestos para cuentas.
NOTA: ¡El icono salve debe presionarse después de la digitación y antes de cambiar la cuenta o el período fiscal!
translation.fr_fr:
Cet outil établit les budgets pour les comptes du Grand Livre.
NOTE: L'icône 'Enregistrer' doit être enfoncée après la saisie des données avant que le compte ou l'exercice fiscal ne soit changé !
translation.ru_ru:
This tool sets the budgets for general ledger accounts.
NOTE: The Save icon must be pressed after data entry before the account or fiscal year is changed!
translation.bg_bg:
Тази опция указва бюджетите за сметките от ГСК.
ЗАБЕЛЕЖКА: Иконата Запази трябва да бъде натисната след въвеждането на данните преди сметката или фискалната година да са сменени!
translation.en_us:
This tool sets the budgets for general ledger accounts.
NOTE: The Save icon must be pressed after data entry before the account or fiscal year is changed!
translation.id_id:
This tool sets the budgets for general ledger accounts.
NOTE: The Save icon must be pressed after data entry before the account or fiscal year is changed!
translation.nl_nl:
Deze tool stelt de budgetten voor grootboek rekeningen in.
OPMERKING: De Bewaar pictogram moet worden ingedrukt na het invoeren van gegevens voordat de rekening of het fiscale jaar is veranderd!
translation.pt_br:
Esta ferramenta gera a previsão orçamentária para as contas da Contabilidade Geral.
ATENÇÃO: O botão SALVAR deve ser pressionado depois da entrada de dados antes de alterar a conta ou o ano fiscal!

translation.bg_bg: ЗАБЕЛЕЖКА: Текущият сметкоплан не може да бъде изтрит ако има записи в журнала!
translation.en_us: NOTE: Current chart of accounts cannot be deleted if journal entries are present!
translation.es_cr: NOTA: ¡El catálogo de cuentas actual no se puede borrar si tiene transacciones asociadas!
translation.id_id: NOTE: Current chart of accounts cannot be deleted if journal entries are present!
translation.nl_nl: Aantekening huidige grootboekrekeningen kunnen hier verwijderd worden als er boekingen op gemaakt zijn.
translation.pt_br: ATENÇÃO: Plano de Contas corrente não pode ser removido se há lançamentos no diário!

translation.es_cr: o catálogo de cuentas a importar:
Reemplace el catálogo de cuentas actual
¿Está seguro que quiere borrar los montos presupuestados en todas las cuentas del año fiscal seleccionado? ¡Esta operación no puede revertirse!
translation.fr_fr: Êtes-vous sûr(e) de vouloir effacer les montants budgétaires dans tous les comptes du Grand Livre pour l'exercice fiscal sélectionné ? Cette opération ne peut pas être annulée !
translation.ru_ru: Are you sure you want to clear the budget amounts in all general ledger accounts for the selected fiscal year? This operation cannot be undone!
translation.en_us: Are you sure you want to clear the budget amounts in all general ledger accounts for the selected fiscal year? This operation cannot be undone!
translation.id_id: Are you sure you want to clear the budget amounts in all general ledger accounts for the selected fiscal year? This operation cannot be undone!
translation.nl_nl: Weet u zeker dat u alle begroting bedragen in alle grootboek rekeningen voor het geselecteerde boekjaar wil verwijderen? Deze bewerking kan niet ongedaan gemaakt worden!
translation.pt_br: Tem certeza de que quer limpar os valores da previsão orçamentária em todas as contas da Contabilidade Geral para o ano fiscal selecionado? Esta operação não pode ser desfeita!

translation.es_cr: ¿Está seguro que quiere reemplazar los montos presupuestados para todas las cuentas para el año fiscal con los montos reales del año fiscal anterior? ¡Esta operación no puede revertirse!
translation.fr_fr: Êtes-vous sûr(e) de vouloir remplacer les montants budgétaires dans tous les comptes du Grand Livre pour l'exercice fiscal choisi avec les montants réalisés de l'exercice précédent ? Cette opération ne peut pas être annulée !
translation.ru_ru: Are you sure you want to replace the budget amounts in all general ledger accounts for the selected fiscal year with actuals from the prior fiscal year? This operation cannot be undone!
translation.en_us: Are you sure you want to replace the budget amounts in all general ledger accounts for the selected fiscal year with actuals from the prior fiscal year? This operation cannot be undone!
translation.id_id: Are you sure you want to replace the budget amounts in all general ledger accounts for the selected fiscal year with actuals from the prior fiscal year? This operation cannot be undone!
translation.nl_nl: Weet u zeker dat u aan de begroting bedragen in alle grootboek rekeningen voor het geselecteerde boekjaar wil vervangen met actuele van het voorgaande fiscale jaar? Deze bewerking kan niet ongedaan gemaakt worden!
translation.pt_br: Tem certeza de que quer substituir os valores da previsão orçamentária em todas as contas da Contabilidade Geral para o ano fiscal selecionado por aquelas do ano fiscal anterior? Esta operação não pode ser desfeita!

translation.fr_fr: La dernière période de l'exercice fiscal modifié ne s'aligne pas avec la date de début du prochain exercice fiscal. La date de début du prochain exercice fiscal a été modifiée et devrait être revue.

translation.ru_ru: The last period of the modified fiscal year does not align with the start date of the next fiscal year. The start date of the next fiscal year has been modified and should be reviewed.

translation.nl_nl: De laatste periode van de gewijzigde fiscale jaar stemt niet af met de start datum van de volgende fiscale jaar. De startdatum van het volgende fiscale jaar is gewijzigd en moeten worden herzien.
translation.pt_br: O último período do ano fiscal alterado não condiz com a data inicial do próximo ano fiscal. A data inicial do próximo ano fiscal foi modificada e deve ser revista.

translation.es_cr: Ha elegido copiar este registro. Esto creará una copia del registro actual con los campos modificados. NOTA: La referencia debe ser diferente o esta operación no se podrá registrar. Presione OK para continuar o Cancele para regresar al formulario.
translation.fr_fr: Vous avez choisi de copier cet enregistrement de journal. Cela va créer une copie de l'enregistrement en cours avec les champs modifiés. NOTE: La référence doit être différente ou cette opération va échouer lors de l'envoi. Appuyez sur OK pour continuer ou sur Annuler pour revenir au formulaire.
translation.ru_ru: You have chosen to copy this journal record. This will create a copy of the current record with the modified fields. NOTE: The reference must be different or this operation will fail posting. Press OK to continue or Cancel to return to the form.
translation.bg_bg: Избрахте да копирате този запис от журнала. Това ще създаде копие на текущия запис с променените полета. ЗАБЕЛЕЖКА: Референцията трябва да бъде различна
translation.en_us: You have chosen to copy this journal record. This will create a copy of the current record with the modified fields. NOTE: The reference must be different or this operation will fail posting. Press OK to continue or Cancel to return to the form.
translation.id_id: You have chosen to copy this journal record. This will create a copy of the current record with the modified fields. NOTE: The reference must be different or this operation will fail posting. Press OK to continue or Cancel to return to the form.
translation.nl_nl: U hebt ervoor gekozen om deze boeking te kopieren. Hiermee maakt u een kopie van de huidige record met de gewijzigde velden. OPMERKING: De verwijzing moet anders of deze operatie zal mislukken tijdens het bewaren. Druk op OK om door te gaan of ANNULEREN om terug te keren naar het formulier.
translation.pt_br: Você escolheu copiar este lançamento de diário. Isto vai criar uma cópia do registro corrente com os campos modificados. ATENÇÃO: A referência deve ser diferente ou esta operação não será completada. Pressiona OK para continuar ou Cancelar para retornar ao formulário.

translation.es_cr: Las fechas calendario del período fiscal se pueden modificar aquí. Note que fechas para un año fiscal no se pueden modificar para el período del último registro y ningún período anterior.
translation.fr_fr: Les dates calendaires d'exercice fiscal peuvent être modifiées ici. Veuillez noter que les dates d'exercice fiscal ne peuvent pas être changées pour une période allant jusqu'à et y compris la dernière écriture du journal général dans le système.
translation.hu_hu: A pénzügyi időszak naptári idejét itt változtathatod. A pénzügyi év dátumait nem változtathatod bármilyen időszakra. Ezen időszak kezdetét leghamarabb az utolsó pénzügyi év után állíthatod.
translation.ru_ru: Fiscal period calendar dates can be modified here. Please note that fiscal year dates cannot be changed for any period up to and including the last general journal entry in the system.
translation.bg_bg: Календарните дати за фискалния период могат да бъдат променени тук. Моля забележете че датите за фискалните години не могат да бъдат променени за нито един период до последния запис в главния журнал в системата включително.

translation.bg_bg: Валидиране на показваната в инвентара стока
translation.fr_fr: Valider dans le stock les quantités disponibles affichées

translation.bg_bg: Тази операция тества дали вашите изброени инвентарни количества в БД инвентар и показаните на екрана за инвентар
translation.en_us: This operation tests to make sure your inventory quantities listed in the inventory database and displayed in the inventory screens are the same as the quantities in the inventory history database as calculated by PhreeBooks when inventory movements occur. The only items tested are the ones that are tracked in the cost of goods sold calculation. Repairing inventory balances will correct the quantity in stock and leave the inventory history data alone.
translation.es_cr: Esta operación hace pruebas para asegurarse que las cantidades de inventario que se encuentran en la base de datos de inventario y que se muestran en las pantallas son las mismas que aparecen en la base de datos de la historia de inventario tal como las calcula Phreebooks cuando ocurre un movimiento de inventario. Los únicos ítems que se verifican son aquellos que se calculan en el costo de bienes vendidos. La reparación de los saldos corrige el inventario sin afectar la historia de inventario.
translation.fr_fr: Cette opération execute un test pour s'assurer que vos quantités disponibles listées dans la table inventory et affichées sur les écrans de stock sont les mêmes que les quantités dans la table inventory_history telles que calculées par PhreeBooks lorsque les mouvements de stock surviennent. Les seuls articles testés sont ceux qui sont suivis dans le calcul du coût des marchandises vendues. La réparation des soldes du stock va corriger uniquement la quantité dans le stock et ne touchera pas les données de l'historique du stock.
translation.id_id: This operation tests to make sure your inventory quantities listed in the inventory database and displayed in the inventory screens are the same as the quantities in the inventory history database as calculated by PhreeBooks when inventory movements occur. The only items tested are the ones that are tracked in the cost of goods sold calculation. Repairing inventory balances will correct the quantity in stock and leave the inventory history data alone.
translation.nl_nl: Deze operatie tests om te controleren of uw inventaris hoeveelheden zijn opgenomen in de inventaris database en weergegeven in de inventaris schermen zijn dezelfde als de hoeveelheden die in de inventaris geschiedenis database
translation.pt_br: Esta operação testa para assegurar que a quantidade no inventário listada na tabela de inventário e mostrada nas telas de inventário são iguais às quantidades no histórico de inventário calculadas pelo PhreeBooks quando há movimentos de inventário. Os únicos itens testados são aqueles que são rastreados no cálculo de custo de mercadoria vendida. Corrigir saldos de inventário corrigirá a quantidade em estoque e não alterará o histórico de inventário.
translation.ru_ru: This operation tests to make sure your inventory quantities listed in the inventory database and displayed in the inventory screens are the same as the quantities in the inventory history database as calculated by PhreeBooks when inventory movements occur. The only items tested are the ones that are tracked in the cost of goods sold calculation. Repairing inventory balances will correct the quantity in stock and leave the inventory history data alone.

translation.bg_bg: Валидиране количество на инвентар на стойности за поръчка
translation.es_cr: Validar cantidades en inventario basado en valores de las órdenes
translation.fr_fr: Valider dans le stock les valeurs des quantités commandées
translation.id_id: Validate Inventory Quantity on Order Values
translation.ru_ru: Инвентаризация: проверка количества товаров в заказах

translation.bg_bg: Тази операция тества дали вашите количества в инвентара на поръчката за покупка и количества на поръчка за продажба съвпадат със записите в журнала. Изчислените стойности от записите в журнала презаписват стойността от таблицата за инвентар.
translation.en_us: This operation tests to make sure your inventory quantity on Purchase Order and quantity of Sales Order match with the journal entries. The calculated values from the journal entries override the value in the inventory table.
translation.es_cr: Esta operación verifica que las cantidades de inventario en Órdenes de Compra y en Órdenes de Venta concuerdan con los registros contables. Tienen precedencia los valores calculados de los registros contables sobre los valores de la tabla de inventarios.
translation.fr_fr: Cette opération execute un test pour s'assurer que
translation.id_id: This operation tests to make sure your inventory quantity on Purchase Order and quantity of Sales Order match with the journal entries. The calculated values from the journal entries override the value in the inventory table.
translation.nl_nl: Deze actie test of de voorraad aantallen op inkoop orders en verkoop Orders overeenkomen met de journaalposten. De berekende waarden uit de journaalposten hebben voorrang op de waarde in de inventaris tabel.
translation.pt_br: Esta operação testa para assegurar que a quantidade no inventário da OC e a quantidade da OV batem com os lançamentos no diário. Os valores calculados nos lançamentos do diário sobrescrevem os valores da tabela de inventário.
translation.ru_ru: This operation tests to make sure your inventory quantity on Purchase Order and quantity of Sales Order match with the journal entries. The calculated values from the journal entries override the value in the inventory table.

translation.bg_bg:
Беше върната грешка при получаването на конфигурационните данни.
PhreeBooks успя да се свърже с базата данни
translation.en_us:
There was an error returned while retrieving the configuration data.
PhreeBooks was able to connect to the database but could not find the configuration table. Looks like the table is missing! Options include deleting /includes/configure.php and re-installing (for new installations) or restoring the database tables (database crash).
translation.es_cr:
Hubo un error leyendo los datos de configuración.
PhreeBooks pudo conectarse a la base de datos pero no pudo encontrar la tabla de configuración. ¡Parece que la tabla no existe! Las opciones para corregir esto son borrar el archivo /includes/configure.php y re-instalar (para instalaciones nuevas o restaurar las tablas de la base de datos.
translation.id_id:
There was an error returned while retrieving the configuration data.
PhreeBooks was able to connect to the database but could not find the configuration table. Looks like the table is missing! Options include deleting /includes/configure.php and re-installing (for new installations) or restoring the database tables (database crash).
translation.nl_nl:
Er was een fout tijdens het ontvangen van de configuratie data.
PhreeBooks was in staat om verbinding te maken met de database maar kon de configuratie tabel. Het lijkt er op dat de tabel mist! Opties inclusief verwijderen /includes/configure.php en re-installeren (voor nieuwe installaties) of herstellen van database tabellen (database crash).
translation.pt_br:
Ocorreu um erro ao ler a informação de configuração.
O sistema foi capaz de connectar com a base de dados mas não encontrou a tabela de configuração. Provavelmente está perdida! Opções incluem excluir /includes/configure.php e reinstalar and re-installing (para novas instalações) ou restaurar as tabelas da base de dados (database crash).
translation.ru_ru:
There was an error returned while retrieving the configuration data.
PhreeBooks was able to connect to the database but could not find the configuration table. Looks like the table is missing! Options include deleting /includes/configure.php and re-installing (for new installations) or restoring the database tables (database crash).

translation.bg_bg: Това действие вече е изпълнено и в момента е блокирано

translation.bg_bg: Модул активи обслужва данните за имуществото на фирмата. Модулът разрешава създаването на допълнителни табове и полета за настройка според нуждите на потребителя.
translation.en_us: The assets module maintains a record of company property. The module allows the creation of additional tabs and fields for customization to the users needs.
translation.es_cr: El módulo activos mantiene la información de la propiedad de la compañía. El módulo permite la creación de pestañas y campos adicionales de acuerdo a las necesidades del usuario.
translation.id_id: Modul aset digunakan untuk mendaftar harta perusahaan. Modul ini memungkinkan kita untuk menambah atau menyesuaikan dengan kebutuhan kita.
translation.nl_nl: De activa module houdt een record van bedrijfseigendommen. De module maakt het mogelijk extra tabbladen en velden toetevoegen en aanpassen aan de wensen van de gebruiker.
translation.pt_br: O módulo de ativos mantém um registro das propriedades da empresa. O módulo permite a criação de abas adicionais e campos para customização de acordo com a necessidade do usuário.

translation.nl_nl: De contact module beheert alle klanten
translation.pt_br: O Módulo Contatos gerencia todos os clientes

translation.pt_br: The Corrective Action/Preventativce action module is useed as part of an internal quality control system to record

translation.bg_bg: The document control module provides a docmuent management system to control many types of documents. The module includes functionality to check-in/check-out documents
translation.en_us: The document control module provides a docmuent management system to control many types of documents. The module includes functionality to check-in/check-out documents
translation.es_cr: El módulo documentos es un sistema para administrar y controlar múltiples tipos de documentos. El módulo tienen la funcionalidad de sacar en préstamo un documento
translation.pt_br: O módulo de controle de documentos fornece um sistema de gerenciamento de documentos para controlar vários tipos de documentos. O módulo inclui funções para baixar/subir documentos

translation.en_us: With this module you can import .csv bank statements. The list is then checked for any outstanding bill or previous bookings with the same description.
translation.es_cr: Con este módulo puede importar un archivo con el estado de cuenta del banco que esté en formato .csv. Esta lista luego puede ser revisada contra cheques pendientes o cheques con el mismo nombre.
translation.nl_nl: met deze module kunt u uw .csv bank rekeningen overzicht importeren deze wordt dan gecontroleerd op openstaande rekening of eventueel eerdere boekingen met dezelfde omschrijving.
translation.pt_br: Com este módulo você pode importar lançamentos bancários. Esta lista será verificada contra as cobranças pendenes ou lançamentos anteriores com a mesma descrição.

translation.en_us: This module will import orders from a csv file into the PhreeBooks ledger.

translation.bg_bg: Модул Инвентар съдържа цялата функционалност за съхранение и управление на продукти и услуги
translation.en_us:
The inventory module contains all of the functionality to store and manipulated product and service items used in your company.
This includes items for internal and external use as was well as products you sell.
translation.es_cr: El módulo inventario contiene toda la funcionalidad para almacenar y manipular ítems de producto y servicion usados por su compañía. Esto incluye artículos para la venta asi como para el consumo interno.NOTA: ¡Este es un módulo del núcleo por lo que no debe ser desinstalado!
translation.id_id: The inventory module contains all of the functionality to store and manipulted product and service items used in your company. This includes items for internal and external use as was well as products you sell. NOTE: This is a core module and should not be removed!
translation.nl_nl:
Deze voorraad module bevat alle functionaliteiten om product en service items gebruikt in uw bedrijf te bewerken en bewaren.
Hier vallen ook dingen onder voor intern en extern gebruik.
translation.pt_br: O Módulo Inventário contém todas as funcionalidades para armazenar e manipular produtos e serviços utilizados em sua empresa. Isto inclui itens para uso interno e externo e produtos vendidos. ATENÇÃO: Este é um módulo central e não deve ser removido!

translation.bg_bg: ПРИОРИТЕТ СРЕДЕН: Задава сметки по подразбиране за тип инвентар в ГСК след зареждане на ГСК сметките (Фирма -> Свойства на модул инвентар -> таб Инвентар)
translation.en_us: PRIORITY MEDIUM: Set default general ledger accounts for inventory types
translation.es_cr: PRIORIDAD MEDIA: Fije la cuenta predeterminada para tipos de inventario después de cargar las cuentas (Compañía -> Administración de módulos -> Módulo Inventario: Propiedades -> Pestaña Inventario)
translation.id_id: PRIORITY MEDIUM: Set default general ledger accounts for inventory types

translation.bg_bg: The payment module is a wrapper for user configurable payment methods. Some methods are included with the core package and others are available for download from the PhreeSoft website. NOTE: This is a core module and should not be removed!
translation.en_us:
The payment module is a wrapper for user configurable payment methods.
Some methods are included with the core package and others are available for download from the PhreeSoft website.
translation.es_cr: El módulo pagos es un programa envolvente para métodos de pago configurados por el usuario. Algunos métodos de pago se incluyen con el programa núcleo y otros están disponibles para descargar en el sitio de PhreeSoft NOTA: ¡Este es un módulo del núcleo por lo que no debe ser desinstalado!
translation.id_id: The payment module is a wrapper for user configurable payment methods. Some methods are included with the core package and others are available for download from the PhreeSoft website. NOTE: This is a core module and should not be removed!
translation.nl_nl:
De betaal module is een huls voor gebruiker configureerbare betaal methodes.
Sommige methodes zijn beschikbaar in de kern software andere zijn beschikbaar voor download van de PhreeSoft website.
translation.pt_br: O Módulo Pagamento permite configurar métodos de pagamento. SAlguns métodos são incluídos na instalação e outros estão disponpiveis para download no website PhreeSoft. ATENÇÃO: Este é um módulo central e não deve ser removido!

translation.bg_bg: Модул phreebooks дава възможност за водене на двустранно счетоводство. Включва функции: Поръчки за покупка
translation.en_us:
The phreebooks module provides double entry accounting.
Functions include Purchase Orders

translation.id_id: The phreebooks module provides double entry accounting. Functions include Purchase Orders
translation.nl_nl:
De phreebooks module biedt dubbele invoer boekhouden.
De functies omvatten Inkooporders
translation.pt_br: O módulo Contabilidade provê lançamentos com contra-partida. Funções incluem Ordem Compra

translation.bg_bg: ПРИОРИТЕТ СРЕДЕН: Въведете информация за фирмата (Фирма -> Администрация на модули -> таб Моята фирма)

translation.id_id: PRIORITY LOW: Set up mail server settings (Company -> Module Admin -> Email tab)
translation.nl_nl: MINST BELANGRIJK: Set up mail server instellingen (Bedrijf -> Module Administratie -> Email tabblad)
translation.pt_br: PRIORIDADE BAIXA: Complete as especificações de servidor de email (aba Empresa -> Módulo Administração -> Email)

translation.bg_bg: ПРИОРИТЕТ ВИСОК: Променете или въведете сметкоплан от първоначалните настройки (Фирма -> Администрация на модули -> Модул PhreeBooks настройки -> таб Сметкоплан)

translation.pt_br: PRIORIDADE ALTA: Alterar ou importar plano de contas das especificações padrão (aba Empresa -> Módulo Administração -> Propriedades Módulo Contabilidade -> Plano de Contas)

translation.bg_bg: Phreeform модулът съдържа инструменти за всички справки и форми
translation.en_us: The phreeform module contains all the report and form tools needed to print reports in PDF or HTML format.
translation.es_cr: El módulo Phreeform contiene todas las herramientas necesarias para imprimir reportes y formularios in formato PDF o HTML. NOTA: ¡Este es un módulo del núcleo por lo que no debe ser desinstalado!
translation.id_id: The phreeform module contains all the report and form tools needed to print reports in PDF or HTML format. NOTE: This is a core module and should not be removed!
translation.nl_nl: De phreeform module bevat alle rapport en formulier tools die nodig zijn om rapporten in PDF of HTML-formaat af te drukken.
translation.pt_br: O Módulo Relatórios contém todas as ferramentas e formulários para imprimir relatórios em formato PDF ou HTML. ATENÇÃO: Este é um módulo central e não deve ser removido!

translation.bg_bg: The PhreeHelp module provides a popup context help screen to display manual entries supplied with modules. NOTE: This is a core module and should not be removed!
translation.en_us: The PhreeHelp module provides a popup context help screen to display manual entries supplied with modules.
translation.es_cr: El módulo PhreeHelp genera pantallas emergentes de ayuda contextual para los módulos. NOTA: ¡Este es un módulo del núcleo por lo que no debe ser desinstalado!
translation.id_id: The PhreeHelp module provides a popup context help screen to display manual entries supplied with modules. NOTE: This is a core module and should not be removed!
translation.nl_nl: De PhreeHelp module voorziet in een popup context help scherm om handleidingen te tonen die geleverd worden bij de modules.

translation.bg_bg: The PhreePOS module provides a Point of Sale interface. This module is a supplement to the phreebooks module and is not a replacement for it.
translation.en_us: The PhreePOS module provides a Point of Sale interface. This module is a supplement to the phreebooks module and is not a replacement for it.
translation.es_cr: El módulo PhreePOS es la interface de punto de venta. Este módulo es un complemento del módulo Phreebooks y no un sustituto de él.
translation.id_id: The PhreePOS module provides a Point of Sale interface. This module is a supplement to the phreebooks module and is not a replacement for it.
translation.nl_nl: De PhreePOS module biedt een kassa / Point of Sale-interface Deze module is een aanvulling op de phreebooks module en is geen vervanging voor.
translation.pt_br: O Módulo PhreePOS fornece uma interface de Ponto De Venda. Este módulo é complementar ao Módulo Phreebooks e não o substitui.

translation.en_us: This is a wiki that your company can use
translation.nl_nl: This is a wiki that your company can use

translation.en_us: The Return Material Authorization (RMA) module manages product returns from customers.
translation.es_cr: El módulo (RMA) es para administrar las devoluciones de los clientes.
translation.id_id: The Return Material Authorization (RMA) module manages product returns from customers.
translation.pt_br: O módulo Autorização Retorno Mercadoria (ARM) gerencia retorno de mercadoria de clientes.

translation.bg_bg: The shipping module is a wrapper for user configurable shipping methods. Some methods are included with the core package and others are available for download from the PhreeSoft website.
translation.en_us: The shipping module is a wrapper for user configurable shipping methods. Some methods are included with the core package and others are available for download from the PhreeSoft website.
translation.es_cr: El módulo envíos es un programa envolvente para métodos de envío configurables por el usuario. Algunos métodos están incluidos en el paquete núcleo y otros están disponibles para descargar del sitio PhreeSoft.
translation.id_id: The shipping module is a wrapper for user configurable shipping methods. Some methods are included with the core package and others are available for download from the PhreeSoft website.
translation.nl_nl: De verzend module is een omhulsel voor configureerbare verzendmethoden. Sommige methoden zijn opgenomen in de kernpakket en anderen zijn beschikbaar om te downloaden uit de PhreeSoft website.
translation.pt_br: O Módulo Entregas é um anexo para configuração de métodos de entrega. Alguns métodos estão incluidos no sistema.

translation.en_us: This module will update the full price an cost of a given sku from a csv file.
translation.es_cr: Este módulo actualizará el precio de venta y el costo de los códigos a partir de un archivo que esté en formato csv que contenga la información.
translation.nl_nl: Deze module zal de volledige prijs en de inkoopprijs updaten van een gegeven art.nr uit het csv Bestand.
translation.pt_br: Este módulo vai atualizar o preço cheio de um SKU a partir de um arquivo csv.

translation.bg_bg: The Translator module provides a convenient interface to translate language files from one language ot another. This module handles version updates as well as full initial translation support.
translation.en_us: The Translator module provides a convenient interface to translate language files from one language ot another. This module handles version updates as well as full initial translation support.
translation.es_cr: El módulo traductor es una interface que facilita la traduccion del programa de un idioma a otro. Este módulo sirve para actualizar versiones anteriores así como también para iniciar nuevas traducciones.
translation.id_id: The Translator module provides a convenient interface to translate language files from one language ot another. This module handles version updates as well as full initial translation support.
translation.nl_nl: De vertaal-module biedt een handige interface om taalbestanden vertalen van de ene taal naar de andere. Deze module behandelt versie updates en installatie ondersteuning.
translation.pt_br: O móudlo de Tradução apresenta uma interface conveniente para traduzir arquivos de idioma. Este módulo gerencia versões de atualização bem como um suporte pleno para uma tradução inicial.

translation.en_us: The Work Order module provides a complete inventory production control system. This module interacts with the Inventory module to control the build process and help manage inventory.
translation.es_cr: El módulo orden de trabajo es un sistema de control completo para la fabricación de artículos de inventario. Este módulo hace interfase con el módulo de inventario pra controlar el proceso de fabricación y administración del inventario.
translation.pt_br: The Work Order module provides a complete inventory production control system. This module interacts with the Inventory module to control the build process and help manage inventory.

translation.es_cr: Esta es una transacción recurrente. ¿Quiere borrar también las futuras transacciones? (Presione cancele para actualizar solo esta transacción)

translation.hu_hu: Ez egy ismétlődő tranzakció. Jövőbeni tranzakiókat is törölni akarod? (Mégsem esetén csak a mostani lesz törölve)

translation.es_cr: Digite el número de serie del ítem de este renglón. NOTA: La cantidad debe ser 1 para items con control de número de serie.
translation.fr_fr: Entrez le numéro de série pour cette ligne article. NOTE: La quantité doit être 1 pour les articles sérialisés.
translation.hu_hu: Add meg a sorozatszámát a terméknek. MEGJEGYZÉS: A mennyiségnek egynek kell lennie sorszámozott termékek esetén.
translation.ru_ru: Enter the serial number for this line item. NOTE: The quantiy must be 1 for serialized items.
translation.bg_bg: Въведете серийния номер за този ред артикул. ЗАБЕЛЕЖКА: Количеството трябва да бъде 1 за сериализирани артикули.

Enter the serial number for this line item.
NOTE: The quantity must be 1 for serialized items.

Voer het serienummer in voor deze boeking.
OPMERKING: Het aantal moet 1 zijn voor serie items.
translation.pt_br: Entre o número serial para este item. ATENÇÃO: A quantidade deve ser 1 para itens serializados.

translation.bg_bg: Не са намерени уникални съвпадения за това sku. Полето за търсене на SKU е върнало няколко съвпадения или не са намерени никакви съвпадения.
translation.en_us: No unique matches for row %s could be found. Either the SKU search field resulted in multiple matches or no matches were found.
translation.es_cr: No se puede cargar ese código. La búsqueda no dió como resultado un código único o se encontraron múltiples artículos conteniendo el código.
translation.id_id: No unique matches for this sku could be found. Either the SKU search field resulted in multiple matches or no matches were found.
translation.nl_nl: Geen resultaten voor regel %s. konden worden gevonden. Ofwel de Art.nr. zoekveld resulteerde in meerdere resultaten of er zijn geen resultaten gevonden.
translation.pt_br: Não foi possível encontrar resposta única para este SKU. Ou o campo de busca resultou em várias respostas ou nenhuma foi encontrada.
translation.fr_fr: Impossible de trouver une correspondance unique pour ce SKU. Soit le champ de recherche SKU a donné lieu à plusieurs correspondances

translation.es_cr: La transacción no puede ocurrir después del último período contable definido en el sistema!

translation.en_us: The posted transaction cannot recur past the last period in the system!

translation.pt_br: A transação enviada não pode The posted transaction não pode ser repetida depois do último período definido no sistema!

translation.es_cr: Esta transacción se puede duplicar en el futuro seleccionando el número y frecuencia de transacciones a crear. La transacción actual se considera la primera transacción de la serie.
translation.fr_fr: Cette transaction peut être répétée à l'avenir en sélectionnant le nombre d'écritures à créer et la fréquence à laquelle elles sont postées. L'écriture actuelle est considérée comme la première répétition.
translation.hu_hu: Ezt a tranzakciót többszörözheted a későbbiekben
translation.ru_ru: This transaction can be duplicated in the future by selecting the number of entries to be created and the frequency for which they are posted. The current entry is considered the first recurrence.
translation.bg_bg: Тази транзакция може да бъде дублирана в бъдеще чрез избиране броя на записите за създаване и честотата
translation.en_us: This transaction can be duplicated in the future by selecting the number of entries to be created and the frequency for which they are posted. The current entry is considered the first recurrence.
translation.id_id: This transaction can be duplicated in the future by selecting the number of entries to be created and the frequency for which they are posted. The current entry is considered the first recurrence.
translation.nl_nl: Deze transactie kan worden gedupliceerd in de toekomst door het selecteren van het aantal vermeldingen die moeten worden gemaakt en de frequentie van waar ze zijn geplaatst. De huidige item wordt beschouwd als de eerste herhaling.
translation.pt_br: Esta transação pode ser duplicada no futuro selecionando o número de lançamentos a ser criado e a frequência de lançamento. O lançamento corrente é considerado a primeira ocorrência.

translation.bg_bg: The link equations must be in SQL snytax. Tables may be identified by the table name from the db as they appear in the drop-down menu without prefixes.

F7 = Show inventory pop-up.
F8 = Show customer pop-up.
F9 = Show payment pop-up.

F8 = Mostrar pop-up clientes.

translation.en_us:
How do you wish that the end total is rounded.
NO means that the end total will not be rounded.
INTEGER means: to the benefit of the customer everything smaller than a dollar will be ignored.
10 CENTS means: to the benefit of the customer everything smaller than 10 cents will be ignored.
NEUTRAL there will be rounded to the nearest 0
translation.nl_nl:
Hoe wil u dat het eindtotaal wordt afgerond.
NEE betekend dat het eindtotaal niet wordt afgerond.
GEHEEL GETAL betekend: dat naar de eerste euro omlaag wordt afgerond.
10 CENTEN Betekend: dat alles naar de eerste 10cent omlaag wordt afgerond.
NEUTRAAL Er zal worden afgerond naar de dichts bij zijnde 0
translation.pt_br:
Como você quer que o total final seja arredondado.
Nãosignifica que o total final não será arredondado.
INTEGER means: to the benefit of the customer everything smaller than a dollar will be ignored.
10 CENTS means: to the benefit of the customer everything smaller than 10 cents will be ignored.
NEUTRAL there will be rounded to the nearest 0
